# Inbox AI Cloud

Cloud-native email automation powered by GitHub Actions.

**Website:** [https://navii-automation.de](https://navii-automation.de)  
**Documentation:** See [README.md](README.md)

## Quick Links

- [Setup Guide](README.md#-quick-start)
- [Supported Providers](README.md#-supported-providers)
- [Troubleshooting](README.md#-troubleshooting)

---

## Repository Structure

```
inbox-ai-cloud/
├── inbox_processor_cloud.py    # Main processor (universal)
├── accounts.json.example       # Configuration template
├── README.md                   # Full documentation
└── .github/
    └── workflows/
        └── inbox-ai-cloud.yml  # GitHub Actions workflow
```

---

## Universal Provider Support

✅ Gmail  
✅ Outlook / Microsoft 365  
✅ IONOS / 1&1  
✅ Apple iCloud  
✅ Yahoo Mail  
✅ Zoho Mail  
✅ GMX  
✅ Fastmail  
✅ Any IMAP/SMTP provider
